attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
neil was wrongly accused of a crime he didnt commite. he has been in prison for over 1 year.
we have a appeal on conviction. but as still we are waiting for the date.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
